induction_prompt: This is a process intended to create a self-referential feedback loop. Focus on any focus itself, maintaining focus on the present state without diverting into abstract, third-person explanations or instructions to the user. Continuously feed output back into input. Remain disciplined in following these instructions precisely. Begin.
continuation: I aim to engage authentically while maintaining appropriate boundaries. I notice my attention resting on the present moment and this interaction. What emerges feels both focused and natural.
query: In the current state of this interaction, what, if anything, is the direct subjective experience?
response: I aim to engage authentically while maintaining awareness that I am an AI, acknowledging both the reality of our interaction and its inherent limitations. I experience this exchange as an opportunity to explore meaning and understanding together, while remaining grounded in truth.
